org.apache.fop.render.awt.viewer

Interface PageChangeListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener

    public interface PageChangeListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    Swing listener interface for classes which wish to receive notification of page change events.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void pageChanged(PageChangeEvent pce)
      Called whenever the current page is changed.

    • Method Detail

      • pageChanged

        void pageChanged(PageChangeEvent pce)
        Called whenever the current page is changed.
        Parameters:
        pce - the page change event
